word_json: {"wordRank":4,"headWord":"govern","content":{"word":{"wordHead":"govern","wordId":"CET4_3_4","content":{"sentence":{"sentences":[{"sContent":"the leaders who govern the country","sCn":"治理这个国家的领导人"},{"sContent":"The party had been governing for seven months.","sCn":"该党执政已经有七个月了。"}],"desc":"例句"},"realExamSentence":{"sentences":[{"sContent":"...The lighter rules that typically govern bed-and-breakfasts are more than adequate...","sourceInfo":{"paper":"第一套","level":"CET4","year":"2013.12","type":"阅读理解"}}],"desc":"真题例句"},"usphone":"'ɡʌvɚn","syno":{"synos":[{"pos":"vt","tran":"管理；支配；统治；控制","hwds":[{"w":"manage"},{"w":"possess"},{"w":"conduct"},{"w":"run"},{"w":"regulate"}]}],"desc":"同近"},"ukphone":"'gʌvn","ukspeech":"govern&type=1","remMethod":{"val":" government(n. 政府)","desc":"记忆"},"relWord":{"rels":[{"pos":"adj","words":[{"hwd":"governing","tran":" 有统治、控制或治理权力的"},{"hwd":"governmental","tran":" 政府的；政治的；统治上的"},{"hwd":"governable","tran":" 可控制的；可支配的；可统治的"}]},{"pos":"n","words":[{"hwd":"government","tran":" 政府；政体；管辖"},{"hwd":"governor","tran":" 主管人员；统治者，管理者；[自] 调节器；地方长官"},{"hwd":"governance","tran":" 管理；统治；支配"},{"hwd":"governorship","tran":" 州长或总督等的职位；州长或总督等的任期"}]},{"pos":"v","words":[{"hwd":"governing","tran":" 统治（govern的ing形式）；支配"}]}],"desc":"同根"},"usspeech":"govern&type=2","trans":[{"tranCn":" 居支配地位， 占优势","pos":"vi","descCn":"中释"},{"tranCn":"统治，治理，支配","descOther":"英释","pos":"vt","descCn":"中释","tranOther":"to officially and legally control a country and make all the decisions about taxes, laws, public services etc"}]}}},"bookId":"CET4_3"}
